1.name: IATI
1.description: The budget identifier reported uses IATI budget identifier categories

2.name: Country Chart of Accounts
2.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to the recipient country chart of accounts

3.name: Other Country System
3.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to a recipient country system other than the chart of accounts

4.name: Reporting Organisation
4.description: The budget identifier reported corresponds to categories that are specific to the reporting organisation

5.name: Other
5.description: The budget identifier reported uses a different vocabulary, not specified in the codelist
